mapper.insert: insert into user_info(user_key, user_id, user_pw, user_name, email, phone, birthday, regDate, address, gender, user_account,which_participant ,registration_num, broker_number) values (#{userKey}, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birthday}, now() ,#{userAddress}, #{gender}, #{userAccount}, #{whichParticipant} ,#{registrationNum} ,#{brokerNumber})
